game.name: Guild of Slayers
game.shortDescription: Survivors-like in full 3D with ragdoll physics. Enemies throw themselves at you as projectiles, crash into allies, and damage each other. Bodies fly. Chaos reigns. Survive waves of undead in the most satisfying horde-slaughter you've ever seen. ğŸ”¥ğŸ’€
